name: Baked Fresh Lobster Recipe
author: Chef Cody
summary: Buttery crackers make a stuffing for this nicely done recipe for fresh lobster. Great for Valentine's day!
ingredients: ½ cup butter, melted and divided
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Plunge the tip of a sharp knife straight down just behind the lobster's eyes to humanely kill the animal
Place the lobster on its back and use a sharp knife to cut open the cavity
Remove the stomach and intestines, and discard
Reserve the tomalley in a small bowl
Mix the cracker crumbs with the tomalley and spoon the mixture into the body cavity
Drizzle about 2 teaspoons of butter over the top
Place the lobster in a 2 inch deep baking dish
Bake the lobster for 30 minutes, uncovered
Set oven to Broil and cook for 3 to 5 minutes just to toast the crackers before serving
